Room.Name: Open Sky
Room.ShortDescription: You are flying near the southern face of Mount Aphinix. 50.n4.e0.s0.w1
Room.LongDescription: You cannot fly any further to the north because of the sheer rock wall in that direction. The upper reaches of the rock face is covered in dark clouds, making it impossible to see how high it goes. It looks like there might be a mine entrance directly below you.
